name: Capital Bank and Trust Company, Trustee, v. Heller, Appellant, et al.
name_abbreviation: Capital Bank & Trust Co. v. Heller

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Capital Bank and Trust Company, Trustee, v. Heller, Appellant, et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The appeal in the above entitled case is dismissed. See opinion in Heller v. Capital Bank & Trust Co., 330 Pa. 174..
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Bertram U. Weinberg, with him Maurice G. Weinberg and David T. Kleindinst, for appellant.
Charles G. Stroh, of Stroh & McGarrell, with him Samuel Handler, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Capital Bank and Trust Company, Trustee, v. Heller, Appellant, et al.
Argued January 7, 1938.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Bertram U. Weinberg, with him Maurice G. Weinberg and David T. Kleindinst, for appellant.
Charles G. Stroh, of Stroh & McGarrell, with him Samuel Handler, for appellees.
April 11, 1938:
